name: Miniforma (Silver Demon Studios)
description:
Miniforma is an action platformer that incorporates elements of minimalism and has been developed by a team of two novice game developers. While we have done our best to create a quality product, we understand that it may not be groundbreaking. We welcome any feedback you may have on the game.

(This game was originally submitted for Brackeys 2022.1 Game Jam. It is the re-uploaded version of it)

As you fall into a deep sleep, you find yourself transported to a strange and dark dream world. This realm is filled with twisted and unsettling sights, and you get the feeling that you are not welcome here.

Despite the ominous atmosphere, you are drawn in by a strange force, and you can't help but explore this nightmarish landscape. You navigate through the darkness using your agility and quick reflexes, jumping from platform to platform and avoiding all manner of dangers.

As you delve deeper into the dream, you encounter all manner of strange and terrifying creatures. Some are twisted and distorted versions of familiar animals, while others are entirely alien and unearthly. You use your skills and quick thinking to defeat these monsters and progress through the dream.

But the true enemy lurks in the shadows - an evil being who has taken control of this dream world and twisted it into a twisted and malevolent place. You must confront this being and put an end to its reign of terror, or be trapped in this nightmare forever.

Through courage and determination, you emerge victorious and awake from the dream, filled with the knowledge that you have saved this strange realm from the darkness.

- Programmer: Rayyan Aziz

- Level Designer: Ammar Ali
